name: V_EHI_PBI_PB_INVOICE_PMT_HX
description: This view filters out invoice data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing invoice.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the payment on the invoice.

columns.name: PMT_AMT
columns.description: Amount of payment towards the invoice.
